DOC.detailed_description: The AP prototype base Modular Model Predictive Control algorithm ( MMPC ) implement Diabetes Assistant ( DiAs ) wearable platform . The study divide two part : first part serve 3 day pilot study conduct hotel/residence near hospital . The investigator recruit 6/8 child ( 5-12 year ) and/or 6/8 adolescent ( 12-18 year ) , type 1 diabetes experience insulin pump . DiAs use 72 continuous hour day night . If part 1 successfully , 2-3 month , study move second part ( main part ) , consist cross-over randomize study conduct camp setting . The participant randomly assign treatment arm ( Artificial Pancreas ) control arm ( sensor-augmented insulin pump ) . Then patient assign arm . Each treatment apply 3 consecutive day . During first period ( day 1-3 ) patient activites diet second period ( day 5-7 ) . The investigator recruit 30/40 child ( 5-12 year ) and/or 30/40 adolescent ( 12-18 year ) , affect type 1 diabetes experience insulin pump therapy .
